articles.title: Elevated C-reactive protein to albumin ratio is a promising predictive biomarker for prognosis in patients with renal cell carcinoma.
articles.summary: In renal cell carcinoma, a higher ratio of inflammatory markers can predict worse patient outcomes and potentially guide treatment strategies.

articles.title: Antibodies to watch in 2026.
articles.summary:
Here's a concise summary focusing on the key points:

A comprehensive review tracks the growing landscape of antibody therapeutics, highlighting increasing global development and diverse clinical pipelines across various medical indications.
